data.title: Maully J. Shah, MBBS, FACC, FHRS, CCDS, CEPS
data.meta_description: Maully J. Shah, MBBS, FACC, FHRS, CCDS, CEPS, is an attending pediatric cardiac electrophysiologist in the Cardiac Center at Children's Hospital of Philadelphia with special interest in pacemakers, ICD implantation and cardiac therapy.
